institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Global Job Support Business Rules/Article 14 (Selection and Evaluation of Operating Organizations)
contents: Article 14 (Selection and Evaluation of Operating Agencies) ① The Chairman may recruit, select, and operate operating agencies every year for the efficient performance of overseas employment support projects. ② The operating agencies under Paragraph 1 shall undergo a proposal deliberation process through open recruitment. ③ Details regarding the recruitment of operating organizations under Paragraph 2 may be determined annually through deliberation by the Support Committee. ④ The Chairman shall conduct an evaluation of operating organizations every year and reflect the results in the selection of operating organizations. This can be done, and the evaluation results of the operating organization can be made public on World Job Plus and the corporation's website.
